89629.text: Fix an issue with container restarts using a modified configmap or secret subpath volume mount.
89629.markdown: Fix an issue with container restarts using a modified configmap or secret subpath volume mount. ([#89629](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89629), [@fatedier](https://github.com/fatedier)) [SIG Architecture, Storage and Testing]

93034.text: Do not add nodes labeled with kubernetes.azure.com/managed=false to backend pool of load balancer.

93052.text: fix: initial delay in mounting azure disk & file

93189.text: Fixed a bug whereby the allocation of reusable CPUs and devices was not being honored when the TopologyManager was enabled
93189.markdown: Fixed a bug whereby the allocation of reusable CPUs and devices was not being honored when the TopologyManager was enabled ([#93189](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93189), [@klueska](https://github.com/klueska)) [SIG Node]
93189.author: klueska

93232.text:
Update Golang to v1.13.14
- Update bazel to 2.2.0
- Update repo-infra to 0.0.8 (to support go1.14.6 and go1.13.14)
  - Includes:
    - bazelbuild/bazel-toolchains@3.4.0
    - bazelbuild/rules_go@v0.22.8
93232.markdown:
Update Golang to v1.13.14
